meanings.sent1: I ordered two footlongs for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant sells footlongs with various fillings.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, everyone marveled at the giant footlongs.
meanings.sent4: The footlongs on the menu seemed to stretch forever.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked footlongs filled the room.
